alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:49AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern White Pine and southeastern Eureka Counties through 1230 PM PDT... At 1148 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Diamond Valley, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Diamond Valley and Eureka Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
